meanings.definition: A social division within a caste, typically based on occupation or descent.
meanings.sent1: In some societies, subcastes specialize in different jobs within the community.
meanings.sent2: The Indian caste system includes various subcastes with distinct roles.
meanings.sent3: The subcastes decided to have a friendly competition to see who could bake the best bread.
meanings.sent4: The subcastes were like puzzle pieces, each fitting perfectly into the larger caste structure.
meanings.sent5: The subcastes were like colorful threads weaving together the fabric of society.

meanings.definition: A subgroup within a larger caste system.
meanings.sent1: The subcastes in the village had their own traditions and customs.
meanings.sent2: Each subcaste had its own unique rituals and practices.
meanings.sent3: The subcastes organized a talent show to showcase their diverse skills.
meanings.sent4: The subcastes were like branches stemming from the same tree of the caste system.
meanings.sent5: The subcastes were like different flavors adding richness to the caste system.
